message.content:
{"id": "18163", 
"title": "Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace", 
"description": "Bug 18163: When using Add Import (Ctrl+M) with a selected text that contains trailing whitespace, nothing happens.", 
"OB": "When selecting some text that has trailing whitespace and using the Add Import feature (Ctrl+M), nothing happens.", 
"EB": "After selecting text with trailing whitespace and using the Add Import feature (Ctrl+M), the selected import should be added without considering any leading or trailing whitespace.", 
"SR": "The Add Import feature (Ctrl+M) should be modified to ignore any leading or trailing whitespace when adding imports based on selected text."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18163', 'title': 'Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace', 'description': 'Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'It often happens to me that I have selected i.e. When I then useCtrl+M (Add Import) nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace withinthe selection.
